channel.title: International CES News
channel.description: Stay up-to-date on the latest developments for 2011 International CES attendees.

item.title: Pre-order Now Available for The Comeback: How Innovation will Restore the American Dream
item.description: In The Comeback, Gary Shapiro shows us how to return innovation to its rightful place at the center of America’s economic policy. The Comeback is a new blueprint for America’s success.

item.title: Broadband Communications – New Ways to Relieve Capacity Woes
item.description: Broadband communications capabilities are increasingly stressed by the demand for high-bandwidth applications such as video, videoconferencing, telemedicine and cloud computing.

item.title: Boomers Boost Your Bottom Line
item.description: There are about 78 million boomers in the US (450 million worldwide) born between 1946 and 1964 — and they're hitting their peak earning and spending.

item.title: Media Money Makers: Turn Content Into Cash
item.description: Media Money Makers, co-sponsored by The Nielsen Co., cuts through the technobabble to reveal reliable business models for monetizing content across the most promising platforms.

item.title: CEA Launches Tech Enthusiast Membership for Individuals
item.description: For the first time in its 86-year history, the Consumer Electronics Association (CEA) has created a membership category exclusively for individuals who are early adopters and fervent supporters of consumer technology.

item.title: On-air Promotional Opportunities at CES with Dave Graveline
item.description: Covering the latest in consumer electronics, "Into Tomorrow with Dave Graveline" will launch their 16th year at the International CES in January.

item.title: Mashable Awards Come to CES
item.description: Mashable is proud to present the fourth annual Mashable Awards, which celebrates major innovations and achievements in the digital and social media landscape.

item.title: The National Academy of Television Arts and Sciences Announced Recipients of 62nd Annual Technology and Engineering Emmy Awards to Take Place at CES
item.description: The National Academy’s prestigious Lifetime Achievement Award in Technology and Engineering will be presented to Sir Howard Stringer, Chairman and CEO of Sony Corporation.

item.title: Living in Digital Times Announced Keynote Speakers for Lifestyle Tracks at 2011 CES
item.description: The lifestyle conference tracks taking place at the 2011 CES focus on the fastest-growing technology consumer markets – from parents and children, to students, young adults, and seniors.

item.title: Audi, Ford, GM/OnStar and Toyota Make CES the Hub for Automotive Electronics
item.description: The upcoming CES will feature an enhanced lineup of in-vehicle technology exhibits, including a new Electric Vehicle TechZone that showcases the full range of high and low speed electric vehicles, energy storage devices and charging solutions.

item.title: Audi's Rupert Stadler Joins Leaders from Microsoft, Verizon and Samsung as 2011 CES Keynote Speakers
item.description: Stadler’s keynote address is slated for 11 a.m., Thursday, January 6, in the Las Vegas Hilton Theater. The 2011 show marks Audi’s first International CES keynote address.

item.title: CES named "North America’s Greenest Show" by Trade Show Executive Magazine.
item.description: The Consumer Electronics Association (CEA), producer of CES, was awarded the highly coveted “Leader in Green Initiatives” Gold 100 Award for outstanding green presence in producing the world’s largest consumer technology tradeshow, the International CES.

item.title: Finalists for i-stage competition announced; winner to receive $40,000 and turn-key exhibit at 2011 CES
item.description: The second place company will receive $7,500 and the option to display at the CES Unveiled event in New York or Las Vegas.

item.title: Plan to attend CES keynote to see unnveiling of Samsung’s future in 3D and display technology
item.description: Samsung's Boo-Keun Yoon to deliver keynote address at the 2011 International CES

item.title: GE, Kenmore and Bissell join CES’ all-new Connected Home Appliances TechZone
item.description: Top appliance manufacturers featured at 2011 International CES, January 6-9, 2011, in Las Vegas, Nevada.

item.title: New to CES: Access on the Go TechZone
item.description: Innovative exhibits focus on new ways of accessing content.

item.title: Exhibitor manuals for 2011 show now online
item.description: Find everything from rules, regulations and deadlines to order forms and contact information.

item.title: Exhibitors get free booth planning advice and assistance through free webast series
item.description: Running during September and October, the free Exhibitor Workshop Webcast series provides you with tools to help you market and promote your brand, receive the ultimate press coverage and turn you into a booth planning and logistics pro.

item.title: Exhibitors: It's time to sign up for the GES Open House
item.description: All official 2011 CES exhibitors are invited to join GES October 21 at its Las Vegas facility as they cover exhibiting at International CES from A to Z.

item.title: Honoring best in CE design and engineering, 2011 Innovations Awards is now accepting entries
item.description: Submissions accepted August 23-September 24.

item.title: Seidenberg’s CES keynote to highlight company’s vision for its LTE 4G wireless technology
item.description: Verizon Chief Executive Officer Ivan Seidenberg will deliver the opening keynote address at the 2011 International CES.

item.title: Innovations 2011 Design and Engineering Awards Call for Judges runs Aug. 2-27
item.description: You can help decide which stunning new ideas go above and beyond in design and engineering to make the cut as an Innovations Honoree.

item.title: A sweet place to meet: CES Meeting Place
item.description: These modular meeting rooms built right on the show floor let you conduct meetings without the usual distractions of the traditional exhibit space buzz or set up a controlled product display area on the show floor.

item.title: Lock in Las Vegas travel rates while prices are low
item.description: The only thing more important than registering for CES is booking hotel and flight accommodations for CES. We do our best to get you there and around town at reasonable rates, so take advantage by making reservations right away.

item.title: Registration opens for 2011 CES
item.description: Free registration is available for early signups.

item.title: Microsoft's Steve Ballmer to deliver preshow keynote address at the 2011 International CES
item.description: Ballmer's address will kick off world's largest technology tradeshow.

item.title: July 1 is first day CES attendees can register for 2011 CES
CES Call for Speakers runs through July 21
item.description: The International CES conference program annually unites the CE industry’s most respected experts to address the latest trends, strategies and profit opportunities.

item.title: CES posts 12 percent attendance growth
item.description: Independent audit verifies more than 126,000 industry professionals at the 2010 CES.

item.title: AHAM and CES join forces to showcase smart appliances in Connected Home Appliances TechZone
item.description: The Consumer Electronics Association (CEA)® today announced the launch of the Connected Home Appliances TechZone at the 2011 International CES, the world’s largest consumer technology tradeshow.
